comment: когда игрок идет по ступенькам, ступеньки баркают

languages.text: Ступеньки норовисто взбрыкивают, кривятся под ногами, пытаются лишить вас равновесия и заставить сломать на них шею.
The rebellious steps are trying to buck you off to make you lose your footing and break your neck.
languages.original_text: Ступеньки норовисто взбрыкивают, кривятся под ногами, пытаются лишить вас равновесия и заставить сломать на них шею.

traits.locale_text: The rebellious steps are trying to buck you off to make you lose your footing and break your neck.
The rebellious steps are trying to buck you off to make you lose your footing and break your neck.
The rebellious steps are trying to buck you off to make you lose your footing and break your neck.
The rebellious steps are trying to buck you off to make you lose your footing and break your neck.
The rebellious steps are trying to buck you off to make you lose your footing and break your neck.
The rebellious steps are trying to buck you off to make you lose your footing and break your neck.

languages.text: 階段はあなたに抗い、足を踏み外させ、首の骨を折ろうとしている。
languages.original_text: The rebellious steps are trying to buck you off to make you lose your footing and break your neck.

traits.locale_text: 階段はあなたに抗い、足を踏み外させ、首の骨を折ろうとしている。

languages.text: 你脚步虚浮，双腿不听使唤，差点不小心倒在地上，摔断脖子。
languages.original_text: The rebellious steps are trying to buck you off to make you lose your footing and break your neck.

traits.locale_text: 你脚步虚浮，双腿不听使唤，差点不小心倒在地上，摔断脖子。

languages.text: Las escaleras rebeldes intentan hacer que te tropieces y te rompas el cuello.
languages.original_text: The rebellious steps are trying to buck you off to make you lose your footing and break your neck.

traits.locale_text: Las escaleras rebeldes intentan hacer que te tropieces y te rompas el cuello.

languages.text: Die rebellischen Stufen versuchen, dich abzuschütteln, damit du stolperst und dir das Genick brichst.
languages.original_text: The rebellious steps are trying to buck you off to make you lose your footing and break your neck.

traits.locale_text: Die rebellischen Stufen versuchen, dich abzuschütteln, damit du stolperst und dir das Genick brichst.

languages.text: Les marches rebelles essaient de vous faire perdre l'équilibre pour vous pousser à vous briser le cou.
languages.original_text: The rebellious steps are trying to buck you off to make you lose your footing and break your neck.

traits.locale_text: Les marches rebelles essaient de vous faire perdre l'équilibre pour vous pousser à vous briser le cou.

languages.text: Asi basamaklar seni üzerlerinden atmaya, ayağını kaydırıp boynunu kırmaya çalışıyor.
languages.original_text: The rebellious steps are trying to buck you off to make you lose your footing and break your neck.

traits.locale_text: Asi basamaklar seni üzerinden atmaya, ayağını kaydırıp boynunu kırmaya çalışıyor.
